sp.name: Advanced Alien Containment
sp.description: To secure and research large or dangerous Alien life forms.

sp.name: Advanced Biochemistry Lab
sp.description: For researching advanced Alien organic technology.

sp.name: Advanced Quantum Physics Lab
sp.description: For researching advanced Alien technology.

sp.name: Advanced Security Station
sp.description: A security station using Alien disrupter technology.

sp.name: Advanced Workshop
sp.description: Needed for building new vehicle types.

sp.name: Alien building
sp.description: This research could reveal a weakness in the Alien defenses.

sp.name: Alien building 1
sp.description: This research could reveal a weakness in the Alien defenses.

sp.name: Alien building 2
sp.description: This research could reveal a weakness in the Alien defenses.

sp.name: Alien building 3
sp.description: This research could reveal a weakness in the Alien defenses.

sp.name: Alien building 4
sp.description: This research could reveal a weakness in the Alien defenses.

sp.name: Alien building 5
sp.description: This research could reveal a weakness in the Alien defenses.

sp.name: Alien building 6
sp.description: This research could reveal a weakness in the Alien defenses.

sp.name: Alien building 7
sp.description: This research could reveal a weakness in the Alien defenses.

sp.name: Alien building 8
sp.description: This research could reveal a weakness in the Alien defenses.

sp.name: Alien building 9
sp.description: This research could reveal a weakness in the Alien defenses.

sp.name: Alien Control System
sp.description: Alien craft guidance System.

sp.name: Alien Energy Source
sp.description: Alien craft energy generator.

sp.name: Alien Gas
sp.description: There is a possibility that a multi-toxin can be suspended in gaseous form, which would increase the efficiency of our Biological weaponry.

sp.name: Alien Propulsion System
sp.description: Alien craft propulsion.

sp.name: Annihilator
sp.description: The Alien threat can only be stopped by destroying their ability to create Dimension gates. A full assault on the Alien Dimensions requires a craft of immense power.

sp.name: Anthropod
sp.description: The Anthropod is a robust humanoid Alien soldier.

sp.name: Anthropod Autopsy
sp.description: The Anthropod is the Alien creature that most resembles the human form.

sp.name: Bio-Transport
sp.description: The capture and study of live Alien specimens will help us understand the nature of the Alien threat. In order to do this we need an inter-dimensional transport vehicle that can contain and sustain Alien life forms.

sp.name: Bio-Transport Module
sp.description: For transporting Alien life forms.

sp.name: Biological Warfare
sp.description: The aim is to develop a toxin that specifically targets the early stages of the Alien life cycle.

sp.name: Boomeroid
sp.description: An intelligent Alien proximity mine

sp.name: Brainsucker
sp.description: A live Brainsucker is a valuable specimen - we must research it as soon as possible.

sp.name: Brainsucker Autopsy
sp.description: This small Alien creature has been seen to attack humans by jumping on the head and gripping with all its limbs.

sp.name: Brainsucker Launcher
sp.description: Fires Brainsucker pods.

sp.name: Brainsucker Pods
sp.description: These pods contain a dormant Alien creature.

sp.name: Chrysalis
sp.description: The study of a live Alien Chrysalis could represent a significant advance in our knowledge of the Alien life cycle.

sp.name: Chrysalis Autopsy
sp.description: The remains of an Alien Chrysalis produces pungent fumes as it decays rapidly.

sp.name: Cloaking Field
sp.description: Reduced detection of vehicles.

sp.name: Devastator Cannon
sp.description: An Alien beam weapon.

sp.name: Dimension Destabiliser
sp.description: A device based on disruption field research which could be used to disable Alien disruption shields.

sp.name: Dimension Gates
sp.description: The mysterious atmospheric phenomenon from which the UFOs are emerging requires urgent attention. We must find out where the Alien craft are coming from.

sp.name: Dimension Missile
sp.description: An Alien guided missile.

sp.name: Dimension Missile Launcher
sp.description: An Alien guided missile weapon.

sp.name: Dimension Probe
sp.description: We need to build an automated device that can be sent through a Dimension gate. This will provide invaluable data which can prepare us for manned missions.

sp.name: Dimension Shifter
sp.description: Transports a vehicle between Dimensions.

sp.name: Disruptor Armor
sp.description: Personal armor can be developed based on disrupter research

sp.name: Disruptor Gun
sp.description: An Alien beam weapon.

sp.name: Disruptor Inversion Bomb
sp.description: An Alien guided missile launched from Alien craft.

sp.name: Disruptor Multi-Bomb
sp.description: A multiple warhead missile.

sp.name: Entropy Launcher
sp.description: An Alien organic weapon.

sp.name: Entropy Pod
sp.description: Ammunition for an Alien weapon.

sp.name: Explorer
sp.description: A craft capable of carrying our agents into the Alien Dimensions is required. The vast Alien structures must be explored and studied. This will help us understand their function and their weaknesses.

sp.name: Heavy Disruptor Beam
sp.description: A beam weapon deployed on Alien craft.

sp.name: Hyperworm
sp.description: The Hyperworm is a small, highly active carnivore.

sp.name: Hyperworm Autopsy
sp.description: The Hyperworm corpse is extremely heavy for its size and appears to be a primitive creature.

sp.name: Large Disruption Shield
sp.description: An Alien energy shield.

sp.name: Light Disruptor Beam
sp.description: A beam weapon deployed on Alien craft.

sp.name: Medium Disruptor Beam
sp.description: A beam weapon deployed on Alien craft.

sp.name: Megaspawn
sp.description: Due to the size of the Megaspawn we need a lot of free space in the Alien Containment facility to hold it and an advanced Bio-lab to study it.

sp.name: Megaspawn Autopsy
sp.description: An extremely large warrior creature.

sp.name: Micronoid
sp.description: A swarming amoebae-like Alien life form.

sp.name: Micronoid Autopsy
sp.description: An unusual jelly like Alien life form.

sp.name: Multiworm
sp.description: A live Multiworm is a rare catch and must be studied immediately as it is a highly unstable life form.

sp.name: Multiworm Autopsy
sp.description: The Multiworm corpse decays rapidly, consumed by its own defense mechanisms. If research is not undertaken soon then we will not be able to preserve the remains.

sp.name: Multiworm Egg
sp.description: A live Multiworm egg gives us an excellent opportunity to observe the Alien life cycle in progress.

sp.name: Multiworm Egg Autopsy
sp.description: This stationary Alien life form appears to be some form of Alien egg.

sp.name: One way to win
sp.description: We must discover a way to beat the Aliens once and for all

sp.name: Overspawn Autopsy
sp.description: The Overspawn is an extremely dangerous Alien terror weapon.

sp.name: Overspawn Autopsy 1
sp.description: A gigantic monster that has ravaged the city.

sp.name: Personal Cloaking Field
sp.description: An Alien device which limits detection.

sp.name: Personal Disruptor Shield
sp.description: An Alien energy shield.

sp.name: Personal Teleporter
sp.description: An Alien teleportation device.

sp.name: Popper
sp.description: An extremely dangerous Alien that must be kept sedated.

sp.name: Popper Autopsy
sp.description: A small bipedal Alien creature.

sp.name: Psimorph
sp.description: A living Psimorph is an extremely dangerous entity which must be kept unconscious, otherwise its Psionic ability would result in subversion of our personnel.

sp.name: Psimorph Autopsy
sp.description: The Psimorph creature is a large mass of tentacles.

sp.name: Queenspawn
sp.description: The enormous hulk of the Queenspawn requires great effort to transport and contain.

sp.name: Queenspawn Autopsy
sp.description: This is a huge egg laying Alien creature.

sp.name: Retaliator
sp.description: In order to combat the increasing aggression and power of Alien craft we must build an inter-dimensional weapons platform.

sp.name: Skeletoid
sp.description: An intelligent, airborne humanoid Alien warrior.

sp.name: Skeletoid Autopsy
sp.description: A humanoid Alien with an exo-skeleton structure.

sp.name: Small Disruption Shield
sp.description: An Alien energy shield.

sp.name: Spitter
sp.description: The Spitter is humanoid in form but has a funnel shaped head.

sp.name: Spitter Autopsy
sp.description: This ungainly creature has a huge funnel for propelling a deadly liquid.

sp.name: Stasis Field Bomb
sp.description: An Alien missile with an immobilizing effect.

sp.name: Teleporter
sp.description: Instantly transports a vehicle over short ranges.

sp.name: The Alien Dimension
sp.description: We must analyze the data from our Alien Dimension probe.

sp.name: The Alien Genetic Structure
sp.description: Investigate the genetic relationships between Alien life forms.

sp.name: The Alien Life Cycle
sp.description: Research the primary stages of the Alien life cycle.

sp.name: The Real Alien Threat
sp.description: Investigate the source of the Alien intelligence and their secret purpose.

sp.name: Toxin Type B
sp.description: A toxin needs to be developed to combat the higher Alien life forms.

sp.name: Toxin Type C
sp.description: A powerful Biological warfare weapon designed to target the Micronoid parasites.

sp.name: UFO type 1
sp.description: Alien inter-dimensional craft

sp.name: UFO type 10
sp.description: Alien inter-dimensional craft

sp.name: UFO type 2
sp.description: Alien inter-dimensional craft

sp.name: UFO type 3
sp.description: Alien inter-dimensional craft

sp.name: UFO type 4
sp.description: Alien inter-dimensional craft

sp.name: UFO type 5
sp.description: Alien inter-dimensional craft

sp.name: UFO type 6
sp.description: Alien inter-dimensional craft

sp.name: UFO type 7
sp.description: Alien inter-dimensional craft

sp.name: UFO type 8
sp.description: Alien inter-dimensional craft

sp.name: UFO type 9
sp.description: Alien inter-dimensional craft

sp.name: Vortex Mine
sp.description: A powerful Alien grenade.

sp.name: X-COM Advanced Control System
sp.description: A superior weapons control system.
